entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:04 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
